p: 6-amino-2-chloroquinoline-3-carbaldehyde (0.002 mol) and (0.002 mol) were dissolved in 15 mL of glacial acetic acid and refluxed for 15 h. On completion, the reaction mixture was poured onto crushed ice and neutralized with diluted NaOH. The solid product, 7-aminopyrimido-(4,5-b)-quinoline-2(1 H)thione (3e), was separated out. m.p. 272 °C.Yield: 82%. Color: yellowish-brown.
